column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////So there's still a very limited amount of ramen joints here in Houston and among those limited choices
column2: JINYA Ramen is the one with the best consistency on the quality of their ramen. I'll be straight
column3: I've eaten ramen in other states and in Asia
column4: Houston ramen scene is still lagging behind from other major metropolitan cities but it's hard to find a ramen place that opens late on the weekend and have a nice bowl of noodle soup to cleanse up your alcohol diluted body that's also not Vietnamese pho.
